description: Layered architecture separating routing, business logic and persistence for clarity.
Domain models for inventory, leads, customers, service tickets and finance offers.
Clear API versioning strategy (e.g. `/v1`, `/v2`) to support breaking changes.
Centralized validation layer with reusable schemas for every endpoint.
Strong typing via TypeScript or a schema-first tool like OpenAPI or Zod.
Consistent error-handling middleware with machine-readable error codes.
Request correlation IDs for tracing complex user journeys across services.
Structured JSON logging with log levels and request context metadata.
Configurable rate limiting to protect public endpoints from abuse.
Built-in JWT or OAuth2 authentication with refresh token rotation.
Role-based access control with granular permissions per resource.
Multi-tenancy support for multi-location dealership groups.
Environment-based configuration management with secrets stored securely.
HTTPS enforcement and HSTS headers for all deployed environments.
Input sanitization and output escaping to mitigate injection risks.
CSRF protection for browser-based consumers.
Secure cookie settings with SameSite and HttpOnly flags where applicable.
Automated security scanning for dependencies and container images.
Audit logging for changes to sensitive data such as pricing and discounts.
Data retention policies with automatic archival and deletion routines.
Configurable PII masking for logs and exports.
GDPR/CCPA-compliant consent tracking for lead capture and marketing.
Inventory schema that tracks VIN, year, length, weight and chassis details.
Support for multiple condition states (new, used, demo, pending sale).
Pricing fields for MSRP, sale price, rebates, taxes and fees.
Location-aware stock with transfer and hold statuses across lots.
Media management for photos, 360 tours, floorplans and video links.
Automated image optimization and CDN delivery for media assets.
Bulk import/export of inventory via CSV, Excel and DMS integrations.
Integration hooks for dealer management systems (DMS) and OEM feeds.
Real-time availability sync with third-party marketplaces (RV Trader, etc.).
Workflow rules for reconditioning, detail and photography steps.
Service scheduling APIs for pre-delivery inspections and warranty work.
Lead capture endpoints for web forms, chatbots, phone logs and QR codes.
Lead enrichment via third-party data (credit, trade-in valuation, geo lookup).
Automated lead assignment based on territory, product line or availability.
Lead scoring that blends engagement, credit tier and inventory fit.
Task and reminder system for follow-ups with due dates and outcomes.
Communication logs capturing calls, SMS, emails and in-person visits.
Email/SMS templates with personalization tokens and A/B testing support.
Unified customer profile combining lead data, purchase history and service.
Quoting engine for monthly payments with lender rate tables and terms.
Digital desking flows for F&I products, warranties and protection plans.
Trade-in appraisal workflows with photo capture and condition checklists.
Document generation for purchase agreements and disclosures.
E-signature integration for contracts and consent forms.
Appointment scheduling with calendar sync to staff calendars.
Test drive slot management with vehicle hold logic.
Delivery scheduling and checklists for walkthroughs and accessories.
Integration with parts inventory for accessory bundles.
Aftermarket upsell tracking (solar kits, towing packages, extended service).
Service ticketing with labor, parts, sublet and warranty claim tracking.
Warranty claims submission to OEM portals with status callbacks.
Recall management with VIN lookups and customer notification tooling.
Maintenance schedules and reminders tied to unit usage and seasons.
Rental module for units with availability calendars and damage deposits.
Fleet management for loaners and courtesy vehicles.
Robust search with filters for specs, price ranges, lifestyle tags and features.
Personalized recommendations using browsing history and saved searches.
Saved favorites and watchlists with price drop notifications.
SEO-friendly URL slugs and metadata for unit detail pages served by the API.
Content management for blog posts, FAQs and landing pages.
Configurable merchandising rules (featured, clearance, seasonal campaigns).
Dynamic banners and badges (e.g., "New Arrival", "Price Drop", "Certified").
Geo-aware location selection and language/currency localization.
Tax calculation service that respects location-based rules.
Shipping/delivery quotes with integrations to logistics partners.
Payment gateway integration for deposits and online reservations.
Support for alternative payments (ACH, financing pre-approvals, wallet).
Real-time analytics events for lead submissions, searches and conversions.
Dashboard KPIs for sales velocity, days on lot, gross margin and CSI scores.
Funnel analytics for lead response times and pipeline conversion rates.
A/B testing hooks for pricing strategies and promotional copy.
Data warehouse exports and BI connectors (Snowflake, BigQuery, Redshift).
Webhooks for inventory updates, lead status changes and appointments.
Event-driven architecture with queues for async tasks and retries.
Caching layer for read-heavy endpoints with cache invalidation policies.
Full-text search index for inventory and content.
GraphQL gateway for flexible front-end consumption when needed.
gRPC/internal APIs for high-performance service-to-service calls.
Health checks and readiness probes for container orchestration.
Distributed tracing instrumentation (OpenTelemetry) across services.
Metrics collection (latency, throughput, error rates) with alerting.
Feature flag system for gradual rollouts and safe experimentation.
Blue/green and canary deployment strategies with automated rollbacks.
Infrastructure-as-code definitions for repeatable environments.
CI/CD pipelines with linting, tests, security scans and preview deployments.
Comprehensive unit, integration and contract tests for all endpoints.
Test data factories and seed scripts for realistic demo environments.
Local developer environment using containers and seeded fixtures.
API documentation with OpenAPI/Swagger and interactive consoles.
SDKs or client libraries for JavaScript, Python and mobile platforms.
Sandbox mode for partners to test against without affecting production data.
Rate- and quota-tracking for partner integrations with billing hooks.
Support SLAs with uptime reporting and status page integrations.
Accessibility-friendly responses and content for ADA compliance.
Localization files for multi-language content and communications.
Backup and disaster recovery runbooks with tested restore drills.
Immutable event log or change data capture stream for analytics.
Observability-driven postmortem process with action item tracking.
